form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: IRVING Federal SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATION

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 IRVING Federal SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATION FOUNDED IN 1913 3515 IRVING PARK ROAD . CHICAGO, ILLINOIS 60618 - (312) 478-3131 4100 WEST LAWRENCE AVENUE . CHICAGO, ILLINOIS 60630 . (312) 286-1919 10 RANCH MART CENTER - BUFFALO GROVE & DUNDEE ROADS - BUFFALO GROVE, ILLINOIS 60090 . (312) 541-7700 March 25, 1977 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: This will certify that I. M. Patel and R. I. Patel, who reside at 4642 N. Karlov Avenue, Chicago, Illinois 60630, have opened a savings account with this Association as of October 20, 1972. As of this date, the balance of this account is $ 9,079.46. IRVING FEDERAL SAVINGS & LOAN Frank Frank M. Dietz, Branch may Manager Subscribed and sworn to before me this 25th day of March, 1977 A.D. 4200 Lyn Suth and Lynn Guth, Notary Public MEMBER FSLIC Savings & Your Savings
